s_synopsis:
SCRAMBLE MODE ZETA, TO: CYBERNAUT SQDRN. CALISTO, PRIORITY ALPHA-SAN 03, BRIEFING: An intersystem intruder has been detected in quadrant FTU-770. Dronecraft sent to get a visual, discovered an extremely large monolith, biomorphic in nature. All attempts to contact ended in destruction of drones.
MISSION: Locate, intercept and enter the SINISTRON. Use any means to destroy it. Proceed with caution. Ion storm activity increasing in your area.
